verses.verse: Moreover the spirit<WH7307> lifted me up<WH5375>, and brought<WH935> me unto the east<WH6931> gate<WH8179> of the LORD'S<WH3068> house<WH1004>, which looketh<WH6437> eastward<WH6921>: and behold at the door<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> men<WH376>; among<WH8432> whom I saw<WH7200> Jaazaniah<WH2970> the son<WH1121> of Azur<WH5809>, and Pelatiah<WH6410> the son<WH1121> of Benaiah<WH1141>, princes<WH8269> of the people<WH5971>.
Then said<WH559> he unto me, Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, these are the men<WH582> that devise<WH2803> mischief<WH205>, and give<WH3289> wicked<WH7451> counsel<WH6098> in this city<WH5892>:
Which say<WH559>, It is not near<WH7138>; let us build<WH1129> houses<WH1004>: this city is the caldron<WH5518>, and we be the flesh<WH1320>. It is: or, It is not for us to build houses near
Therefore prophesy<WH5012> against them, prophesy<WH5012>, O son<WH1121> of man<WH120>.

And the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> fell<WH5307> upon me, and said<WH559> unto me, Speak<WH559>; Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>; Thus have ye said<WH559>, O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: for I know<WH3045> the things that come<WH4609> into your mind<WH7307>, every one of them.
Ye have multiplied<WH7235> your slain<WH2491> in this city<WH5892>, and ye have filled<WH4390> the streets<WH2351> thereof with the slain<WH2491>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Your slain<WH2491> whom ye have laid<WH7760> in the midst<WH8432> of it, they are the flesh<WH1320>, and this city is the caldron<WH5518>: but I will bring you forth<WH3318> out of the midst<WH8432> of it.
Ye have feared<WH3372> the sword<WH2719>; and I will bring<WH935> a sword<WH2719> upon you, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
And I will bring you out<WH3318> of the midst<WH8432> thereof, and deliver<WH5414> you into the hands<WH3027> of strangers<WH2114>, and will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> among you.
Ye shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>; I will judge<WH8199> you in the border<WH1366> of Israel<WH3478>; and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.
This city shall not be your caldron<WH5518>, neither shall ye be the flesh<WH1320> in the midst<WH8432> thereof; but I will judge<WH8199> you in the border<WH1366> of Israel<WH3478>:

And ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>: for ye have not walked<WH1980> in my statutes<WH2706>, neither executed<WH6213> my judgments<WH4941>, but have done<WH6213> after the manners<WH4941> of the heathen<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> you. for ye: or, which have not walked

And it came to pass, when I prophesied<WH5012>, that Pelatiah<WH6410> the son<WH1121> of Benaiah<WH1141> died<WH4191>. Then fell I down<WH5307> upon my face<WH6440>, and cried<WH2199> with a loud<WH1419> voice<WH6963>, and said<WH559>, Ah<WH162> Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>! wilt thou make<WH6213> a full end<WH3617> of the remnant<WH7611> of Israel<WH3478>?
Again the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto me, saying<WH559>,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, thy brethren<WH251>, even thy brethren<WH251>, the men<WH582> of thy kindred<WH1353>, and all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> wholly, are they unto whom the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> have said<WH559>, Get you far<WH7368> from the LORD<WH3068>: unto us is this land<WH776> given<WH5414> in possession<WH4181>.

Therefore say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Although I have cast them far off<WH7368> among the heathen<WH1471>, and although I have scattered<WH6327> them among the countries<WH776>, yet will I be to them as a little<WH4592> sanctuary<WH4720> in the countries<WH776> where they shall come<WH935>.

Therefore say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; I will even gather<WH6908> you from the people<WH5971>, and assemble<WH622> you out of the countries<WH776> where ye have been scattered<WH6327>, and I will give<WH5414> you the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>.
And they shall come<WH935> thither, and they shall take away<WH5493> all the detestable things<WH8251> thereof and all the abominations<WH8441> thereof from thence.

And I will give<WH5414> them one<WH259> heart<WH3820>, and I will put<WH5414> a new<WH2319> spirit<WH7307> within<WH7130> you; and I will take<WH5493> the stony<WH68> heart<WH3820> out of their flesh<WH1320>, and will give<WH5414> them an heart<WH3820> of flesh<WH1320>:
That they may walk<WH3212> in my statutes<WH2708>, and keep<WH8104> mine ordinances<WH4941>, and do<WH6213> them: and they shall be my people<WH5971>, and I will be their God<WH430>.

But as for them whose heart<WH3820> walketh<WH1980> after the heart<WH3820> of their detestable things<WH8251> and their abominations<WH8441>, I will recompense<WH5414> their way<WH1870> upon their own heads<WH7218>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
Then did the cherubims<WH3742> lift up<WH5375> their wings<WH3671>, and the wheels<WH212> beside<WH5980> them; and the glory<WH3519> of the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> was over them above<WH4605>.

And the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> went up<WH5927> from the midst<WH8432> of the city<WH5892>, and stood<WH5975> upon the mountain<WH2022> which is on the east side<WH6924> of the city<WH5892>.

Afterwards the spirit<WH7307> took me up<WH5375>, and brought<WH935> me in a vision<WH4758> by the Spirit<WH7307> of God<WH430> into Chaldea<WH3778>, to them of the captivity<WH1473>. So the vision<WH4758> that I had seen<WH7200> went up<WH5927> from me.
Then I spake<WH1696> unto them of the captivity<WH1473> all the things<WH1697> that the LORD<WH3068> had shewed<WH7200> me.
